@graph.name: Pistachio Apricot Thumbprint Cookies - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: How to make the best Pistachio Apricot Thumbprint Cookies that melt in your mouth. Pistachio shortbread cookies filled with Apricot Jam. Vegan Cookie Recipe

@graph.name: Pistachio Apricot Thumbprint Cookies
@graph.description: How to make the best Pistachio Apricot Thumbprint Cookies that melt in your mouth. Pistachio shortbread cookies filled with Apricot Jam. Vegan Cookie Recipe, Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast. Makes 16 small cookies
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup white whole wheat flour  (or spelt flour or whole wheat pastry flour or use a gluten-free flour blend or Oat flour to make gf)
2 tbsp non dairy yogurt or cashew cream (I use So Delicious Plain Coconut milk yogurt)
1/3 cup + 1 tbsp powdered vegan sugar (use a Tbsp less for less sweet)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the flour, ground pistachio, baking soda and salt. whisk well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, combine the flour, ground pistachio, baking soda and salt. whisk well.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, melt the vegan butter. Add non dairy yogurt, sugar and almond extract and mix until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, melt the vegan butter. Add non dairy yogurt, sugar and almond extract and mix until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dry to the bowl and mix until combined. The dough should be soft and well formed. Add a tsp or so more flour if too sticky, or a sprinkle of non dairy milk if too dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dry to the bowl and mix until combined. The dough should be soft and well formed. Add a tsp or so more flour if too sticky, or a sprinkle of non dairy milk if too dry.

recipeInstructions.text: Chill for 15 to 20 minutes. Preheat the oven to 345 degrees F / 170ºc
recipeInstructions.name: Chill for 15 to 20 minutes. Preheat the oven to 345 degrees F / 170ºc

recipeInstructions.text: Make small balls of the dough and press in the center to make a deep dent. Place on parchment lined baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Make small balls of the dough and press in the center to make a deep dent. Place on parchment lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Take 3 to 4 Tbsp apricot preserves/jam in a small bowl and whisk a bit to make it smooth. Fill the cookies with 1/2 to 3/4 tsp apricot preserves.
recipeInstructions.name: Take 3 to 4 Tbsp apricot preserves/jam in a small bowl and whisk a bit to make it smooth. Fill the cookies with 1/2 to 3/4 tsp apricot preserves.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15 to 16 minutes. Cool completely and serve or store.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 15 to 16 minutes. Cool completely and serve or store.
